item.title: Remove public from URL Laravel 4
item.description: Move all content of (files in) public/ folder one level above (to the base) Fix paths in index.php: require __DIR__.'/bootstrap/autoload.php'; $app = require_once __DIR__.'/bootstrap/start.php'; Fix path in bootstrap/paths.php: 'public' => __DIR__.'/..', Done Source
